overview:
Since its founding in 1991, Roadpost’s portfolio of satellite voice and data solutions have been widely adopted by thousands of clients that work or travel beyond the limits of landline or cellular coverage. Working with the industry’s most capable satellite network operators and equipment manufacturers, we have developed deep expertise to address an array of telecommunications issues – from the most basic to the very complex. Our portfolio includes products from leaders like Iridium, Inmarsat, GeoPro and Beam Communications. This enables us to expertly address everything from basic voice service or high speed broadband data requirements, to integrated tracking and SCADA/telemetry applications as well as customized solutions.

Roadpost extends the value of these products with exclusive convenient services including web self-service options, service optimization tools, competitive rate plans and 24-hour customer support. For seasonal or occasional customers, Roadpost also offers satellite voice and data equipment rentals that can be at your door in less than 24 hours.

Roadpost serves individuals, all levels of government, and private organizations from a variety of industries including mining, oil and gas, exploration, forestry, utilities, public safety, and transportation. Roadpost products and services can be purchased directly through our website, our sales department, or locally through a network of authorized dealers throughout North America.
